attributes.action: About:  Sale of of washing-up liquids/laundry detergents,shampoos /
attributes.additional_details:
I LIVE IN REDBRIDGE AND WOULD LIKE TO SEE IT HERE FIRST. IT WOULD BE WONDERFUL TO SEE THAT SUCH SIMPLE IDEA  WORKS. 
WOODFORD CCL REDBRIDGE BOROUGH TOM McCLAREN IS FOR IT.
LET US DO IT FOR OUR OWN SAKE. 

PLEASE SIGN & BIG THANK YOU.
attributes.background:
PROPOSE TO INSTALL DISPENSERS FOR SALE OF THE ABOVE IN FRONT OF MAJOR SUPERMARKETS. BRING YOUR OWN BOTTLE AND FILL AS REQUIRED. IN THIS WAY WE CUT DOWN UNNECESSARY PRODUCTION OF PLASTIC BOTTLES AND SLOW DOWN RECYCLING CYCLES.
WE MAKE OUR ENVIRONS LOOKING GOOD AND HEALTHY.

rejection.details: This petition seems to be calling on supermarkets, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action.
